title: Novela
overview: Follows Isabel, a screenwriter who dedicated her life to reaching the post of author of the nine o'clock soap opera. When the opportunity finally arrives, she is betrayed by her mentor, Lauro Valente, who seizes the chance to make a new success. In the premiere, when Isabel decides to face him, she ends up magically entering his production as the protagonist. Now, as part of a melodrama full of conflicts, revenge and impossible loves, Isabel will face her emotional difficulties and put to the test the belief that it is only possible to be happy alone.
